EmailTemplate.description: Used to send volunteers a reminder to update their case if no updates have been provided within the stale case period
EmailTemplate.name: Stale Case Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Case Update Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.Name},
Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber} Case Subject: {!Case.Subject} Client: {!Case.00N4100000cw3MX}, {!Case.00N4100000cw3MW}
No activity or updates have been reported in {!Case.Stale_Case_Setting__c} days for the case above. Please select an option below to provide an update on the case.
I would like to update the case: {!$Setup.JusticeServer_Settings__c.Case_Portal_URL__c}{!Case.00N0a00000CfwUh}
Please snooze the case reminder for
1 Day: {!$Setup.JusticeServer_Settings__c.Snooze_Site_URL__c}?id={!Case.Id}&duration=1&scale=Days
1 Week: {!$Setup.JusticeServer_Settings__c.Snooze_Site_URL__c}?id={!Case.Id}&duration=1&scale=Weeks
2 Weeks: {!$Setup.JusticeServer_Settings__c.Snooze_Site_URL__c}?id={!Case.Id}&duration=2&scale=Weeks
3 Weeks: {!$Setup.JusticeServer_Settings__c.Snooze_Site_URL__c}?id={!Case.Id}&duration=3&scale=Weeks
1 Month: {!$Setup.JusticeServer_Settings__c.Snooze_Site_URL__c}?id={!Case.Id}&duration=1&scale=Months
2 Months: {!$Setup.JusticeServer_Settings__c.Snooze_Site_URL__c}?id={!Case.Id}&duration=2&scale=Months
3 Months: {!$Setup.JusticeServer_Settings__c.Snooze_Site_URL__c}?id={!Case.Id}&duration=3&scale=Months
